entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
